title: add QWen
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
新增通义千问模型
```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers.qwen.modeling import QWenForCausalLM
from paddlenlp.transformers.qwen.tokenizer import QWenTokenizer
from paddlenlp.transformers.qwen.configuration import QWenConfig

tokenizer = QWenTokenizer.from_pretrained('Qwen/Qwen-7B')
inputs = tokenizer('蒙古国的首都是乌兰巴托（Ulaanbaatar）\n冰岛的首都是雷克雅未克（Reykjavik）\n埃塞俄比亚的首都是', return_tensors='pd', padding=True)

model = QWenForCausalLM.from_pretrained('Qwen/Qwen-7B')
output = model.generate(input_ids=inputs['input_ids'], attention_mask=inputs['attention_mask'], decode_strategy='greedy_search', max_length=100)
print(tokenizer.decode(output[0][0])

'''
'亚的斯亚贝巴（Addis Ababa）\n尼日利亚的首都是阿布贾（Abuja）\n巴基斯坦的首都是伊斯兰堡（Islamabad）\n菲律宾的首都是马尼拉（Manila）\n波兰的首都是华沙（Warsaw）\n葡萄牙的首都是里斯本（Lisbon）\n俄罗斯的首都是莫斯科（Moscow）\n新加坡的首都是新加坡（Singapore）\n南非的首都是比勒陀利亚（Pretoria）\n西班牙的首'
'''
```

title: [Bug]: Wrong Prediction UIE information extraction
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle:2.5.1
- paddlepaddle-gpu: -
- paddlenlp: 2.5.2
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
failed to predict with uie information extraction model uie-base-en and other models too.

[2023-08-13 14:58:52,468] [    INFO] - All model checkpoint weights were used when initializing UIE.

[2023-08-13 14:58:52,468] [ WARNING] - Some weights of UIE were not initialized from the model checkpoint at /root/.paddlenlp/taskflow/information_extraction/uie-base-en and are newly initialized: ['ernie.embeddings.task_type_embeddings.weight']
You should probably TRAIN this model on a down-stream task to be able to use it for predictions and inference.
[2023-08-13 14:58:52,474] [    INFO] - Converting to the inference model cost a little time.
I0813 14:58:55.815749     1 interpretercore.cc:237] New Executor is Running.
[2023-08-13 14:59:00,084] [    INFO] - The inference model save in the path:/root/.paddlenlp/taskflow/information_extraction/uie-base-en/static/inference
[2023-08-13 14:59:00,937] [    INFO] - We are using <class 'paddlenlp.transformers.ernie.tokenizer.ErnieTokenizer'> to load '/root/.paddlenlp/taskflow/information_extraction/uie-base-en'.
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

```
from pprint import pprint
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
import re
schema = ['Destination','Price','Time']
ie_en = Taskflow('information_extraction', schema=schema, model='uie-base-en')

class FlightInfoExctractor():
    def __init__(self,info:list,debug=False):
        self.info = info
        if debug:
            print(info)
    
    def get_price(self):
        price = re.findall(r'(\$?\d+(?:,\d{3})*(?:\.\d{2})?)', self.info[0]['Price'][0]['text'])
        return price
    
    def get_city(self):
        try:
            city = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z][a-z]+(?:\s[A-Z][a-z]+)*)', self.info[0]['Destination'][0]['text'])
            return city
        except KeyError:
            if self.debug:
                print('No city was found in message')
            return False

message = "Peace be upon you, dear. I want to book a ticket today to cairo in the evening with a price of 1000 to 2000 SAR"
info = ie_en(message)
pprint(info)
```

title: [Bug]: beam search 存在一些问题
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
paddle-bfloat      0.1.7
paddle2onnx        1.0.6
paddlefsl          1.1.0
paddlenlp          2.6.0rc0.post0
paddlepaddle-gpu   0.0.0.post112
paddleslim         2.4.1
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
在 generation_utils.py的beam_search函数内部（1533-1537行，或搜索 map_structure)有这么一段代码：


if "cache" in model_kwargs and model_kwargs["cache"] is not None:
    # reorder the cache
    model_kwargs["cache"] = map_structure(
    lambda x: paddle.index_select(x, beam_idx), model_kwargs["cache"]
    )


这一段代码的作用是在 beam search 期间，选中 top num beams 个 next tokens 后，需要把past_key_value更新至与这些 next tokens 相对应，这里的代码写法存在两个问题：
  1.model_kwargs['cache']由 每个模型内的update_model_kwargs_for_generation函数更新，但是每个模型内对这个字段的命名不同，有的模型会命名为'past_key_values'(目前发现的有 chatglm_v2，ernie35和llama），这样会使这些模型使用beam search时不会走这一段代码，导致生成结果不准确（但不会导致报错）。
  2.上面贴出的代码是对model_kwargs['cache']直接进行 index_select，且默认为 axis0，然而 chatglm 模型组织 past_key_values/cache 的 shape 为 (kv_length, batch_size, num_heads, head_dim),这种情况下会导致 index_select函数直接对 0 维，也就是 kv_length进行修改，如果 kv_length != batch_size的情况下会导致报错。

涉及的模型：
  chatglm_v2, ernie35, llama会有 beam search 结果不准确的情况
  chatglm 无法使用 beam search
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

问题一不会触发报错不复现，问题二的复现方法：
   1.把llm/chatglm/predict_generation.py里的 generate 参数改成使用 beam search
```python
 result = self.model.generate(
            **inputs,
            decode_strategy="beam_search",
            num_beams=5,
            max_length=self.tgt_length,
            bos_token_id=self.tokenizer.bos_token_id,
            eos_token_id=self.tokenizer.eos_token_id,
            pad_token_id=self.tokenizer.pad_token_id,
            use_cache=True,
        )
```
  2.然后使用脚本进行推理就会触发shape unmatched报错
```bash
python predict_generation.py \
    --model_name_or_path  THUDM/chatglm-6b  \
    --batch_size  2
```
这里 batch_size设为 2，而 num_beam 为 5，在 map_structure函数执行前打断点，可以看到函数执行前 cache key 部分的 shape 为[kv_length, batch_size, num_heads, head_dim]，执行完 map_structure后 cache key 部分 shape 为[batch_size, batch_size, num_heads, head_dim]，这将导致下一次模型 forward 出错。

title: [Bug]: AttributeError: module 'paddlenlp.transformers.ernie.tokenizer' has no attribute 'ErnieFastTokenizer'
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
paddle-bfloat                  0.1.7
paddle2onnx                    1.0.5
paddlefsl                      1.1.0
paddlenlp                      2.5.2
paddlepaddle-gpu               2.4.1
x2paddle                       1.4.0
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
推理的时候报错：
AttributeError: module 'paddlenlp.transformers.ernie.tokenizer' has no attribute 'ErnieFastTokenizer'
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

使用model_zoo/ernie-3.0的示例代码，修改了
tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_args.model_name_or_path, use_fast=True)
用来使用 FastTokenizer。
训练完成之后，模型的tokenizer_config.json里面 tokenizer_class:"ErnieFastTokenizer"

然后加载模型进行推理，报错
AttributeError: module 'paddlenlp.transformers.ernie.tokenizer' has no attribute 'ErnieFastTokenizer'
推理的时候也是用
tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_args.model_name_or_path, use_fast=True)

查看了一下tokenizer代码：
        if init_class:
            class_name = cls._name_mapping[init_class]
            import_class = import_module(f"paddlenlp.transformers.{class_name}.tokenizer")
            tokenizer_class = getattr(import_class, init_class)
            if use_fast:
                fast_tokenizer_class = cls._get_fast_tokenizer_class(init_class, class_name)
                tokenizer_class = fast_tokenizer_class if fast_tokenizer_class else tokenizer_class
            return tokenizer_class

在这个地方：
            tokenizer_class = getattr(import_class, init_class)

确实是没有对tokenizer_config.json里面 tokenizer_class:"ErnieFastTokenizer" 进行处理的，因为use_fast的分支在后面。
